00117 // ORDERS
00118 enum
00119 {
00120       STATIONARY = 0,         // moves max 1 sq., no matter what's going on
00121       ONGUARD,                            // moves max 2 sqs. until alerted by something
00122       CLOSEPATROL,                  // patrols within 5 spaces until alerted
00123       FARPATROL,                    // patrols within 15 spaces
00124       POINTPATROL,                  // patrols using patrolGrids
00125       ONCALL,                                   // helps buddies anywhere within the sector
00126       SEEKENEMY,                    // not tied down to any one particular spot
00127       RNDPTPATROL,                  // patrols randomly using patrolGrids
00128       SNIPER,                             // snipes
00129       MAXORDERS
00130 };

00350 // MACROS
00351 // This will set an animation ID
00352 #define                 SET_PALETTEREP_ID( a, b )                       ( strcpy( a, b ) )
00353                                                                                                                                     // strcmp returns 0 if true!        
00354 #define     COMPARE_PALETTEREP_ID( a, b )       ( strcmp( a, b ) ? FALSE : TRUE )
